column4: when I click on systems-->preferences-->sounds, and then click on TEST button I hear a BEEP noise, however when  I attempt to play videos I do not hear the sound.
Please help----when I click on systems-->preferences-->sounds, and then click on TEST button I hear a BEEP noise, however when  I attempt to play videos I do not hear the sound.
if i had to guess, you dont have the proper codec, have you installed any besides the defaults?
run sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras or install it from synaptic or the application > add/remove, search for restricted
any of those will install a bunch of goodies to get you going including flash and a few codecs
let me know how that goes
that is ok, just wait for it to finish and then try to play the video
the downloading has finished but the sound from youtube.com still does not work
do movies in like the movie player work or is it just youtube?
im working on it, but you might want to mention to the channel youre having trouble getting your external sound card to work
before you do, does sound work in videos not online, like local videos lke one of the example videos installed with the system
Are there any videos on my ubuntu systems that came with it?
there should be an Examples folder on your desktop or in your home folder, if not you should be able to create a new user and that user will have them
or just google for a .avi and download it
I am in the process of downloading .avi video
sorry things are slow, did you get that video yet?
